level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-371
level.text: For history of Law 18-371, see notes under § 2-351.01

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority under D.C. Law 17-137, the "Excellence in Local Business Contract Grading Act of 2008", see Mayor's Order 2009-8, January 29, 2009 (56 DCR 2025).
